description: Try our easy to follow Gravy From Scratch recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Gravy,Roast,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Christmas,Soy free,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Gravy From Scratch Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Cut 8 chicken wings into sections and place in a roasting pan with 1 chopped onion, 2 chopped carrots and 2 chopped sticks celery. Add 2 tbs olive oil and a few sprigs of thyme or rosemary and season with salt and pepper. Roast for 45 minutes until golden.
Transfer pan to stovetop over medium heat. Sprinkle over 1/4 cup plain flour and stir with a wooden spoon for 5 minutes until golden. Gradually stir in 1 cup boiling water, scraping base of pan.

Add a further 5 cups boiling water and 1 tbs Worcestershire sauce. Simmer for 15-20 minutes until thickened. Using a sieve, strain into a saucepan, pressing firmly. Discard wings and vegetables. Serve immediately.
